Headers with no explicit numbering
.
# Header

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

# Header

## Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.
.
.

Headers with explicit paragraph numbering
.
# Header {¶=1}

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## Subheader {¶=1:1}

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## Subheader {¶=1:2}

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

# Header {¶=2}

## Subheader {¶=2:1}

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## Subheader {¶=2:2}

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.
.
.

Headers with numbers at the beginning
.
# 1: Header

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## 1.1: Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## 1.2: Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

# 2: Header

## 2.1: Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## 2.2: Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.
.
.

Headers with numbers at the end
.
# Header 1

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## Subheader 1.1

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## Subheader 1.2

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

# Header 2

## Subheader 2.1

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## Subheader 2.2

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.
.
.

Headers with mixed number locations
.
# Header 1

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## 1:1 Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## 1:2 Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

# Header 2

## 2:1 Subheader

Paragraph text.

Paragraph text.

## 2:2 Subheader

Paragraph text.
